statements: SELECT * FROM IoTData WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, timestamp FROM IoTData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT device_id, device_name, humidity FROM IoTData WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT device_name, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM IoTData WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM IoTData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM IoTData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_name, temperature, humidity FROM IoTData WHERE device_name LIKE 'Sensor%' AND temperature < 20 ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT device_id, device_name, timestamp FROM IoTData WHERE temperature > 30 OR humidity < 40 ORDER BY device_id DESC
SELECT * FROM IoTData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 AND humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM IoTData WHERE device_name IN ('Sensor1', 'Sensor2', 'Sensor3') ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_type = 'sensor' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM IoT_devices WHERE location LIKE 'kitchen%' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, timestamp FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoT_devices WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_type = 'Temperature Sensor' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity Sensor';
SELECT device_id, MAX(sensor_value) FROM Sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING MAX(sensor_value) > 50;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM DeviceStatus ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, log_type, log_message FROM DeviceLogs WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_type, value FROM IoTDevices WHERE value > 50;
SELECT * FROM DeviceLogs ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'sensor'
SELECT device_id, value FROM IoTDevices WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT device_id, timestamp, status FROM DeviceStatus WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM DeviceLogs WHERE log_type = 'error' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT device_id, log_message FROM DeviceLogs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%'
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, location, last_updated FROM IoTDevices WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT device_name, error_message, timestamp FROM IoTDevices JOIN ErrorLog ON IoTDevices.device_id = ErrorLog.device_id;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT device_name, status FROM IoTDevices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, location, last_updated FROM IoTDevices WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, MAX(data_value) AS max_value FROM DeviceReadings GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, status_message FROM DeviceStatus ORDER BY status_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceAlerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Thermostat%';
SELECT device_id, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, data_stream->'temperature' AS temperature FROM IoTDevices WHERE location='Kitchen' AND device_name LIKE 'Device_%' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT d.device_name, da.alert_message, da.alert_timestamp FROM IoTDevices d JOIN DeviceAlerts da ON d.device_id = da.device_id WHERE da.alert_timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS error_count, device_id FROM DeviceErrors GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY error_count DESC LIMIT 3;
